text: Gürkan is a Turkish surname and given name for males. People named Gürkan include: ==Given names== * Gürkan Coşkun (born 1941), Turkish painter * Gürkan Ekren (born 1974), Turkish footballer * Gürkan Sermeter (born 1974), Swiss footballer of Turkish descent * Mehmet Gürkan Öztürk (born 1989), Turkish footballer ==Surname== * Aydın Güven Gürkan (1941 – 2006), academician and politician * Haşmet Muzaffer Gürkan (1924–1962), Turkish Cypriot newspaper editor assassinated by the TMT paramilitary group * Fatoş Gürkan (born 1966), Turkish lawyer and politician Category:Turkish masculine given names
title: Gürkan
